title: Related-Assets.Detect.Output
description: Profile-aware output for the Related-Assets.Detect capability.

related_assets.description: Detected related assets for each input asset.

asset_name.description: The asset for which related assets were detected.

related.description: List of asset names related to the given asset.

profile.description: Optional updated profile after applying profilePatch.

profilePatch.description: Optional patch representing modifications applied during execution.

governanceLabels.description: Optional governance labels for downstream classification.
